CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 18, 1961, pg. 7, reads: "Preparing Christmas Cheer - In order that under-privileged youngsters will not be forgotten by Santa Claus, these members of the Anna B. Heldman Society are preparing used and discarded toys, which will be sold to needy families at a very low price, during their annual Christmas Toy Bazaar, which will be held this year on Dec. 9, at the center... in bottom picture are Mrs. Charlesetta Wiggins, Miss Lois Eisenhard, Mrs. Jayne Shelton, Mrs. Ruth G. Boler, program director at the center, and Mrs. Gladys Coffey. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Anna B. Held Society, from left: Charlesetta Wiggins, Lois Eisenhard, Jayne Shelton, Ruth G. Boler, and Gladys Coffey, standing over table with toys for Christmas bazaar
